item.title: Raichur DC office receives bomb threat; Bomb squad conducts inspection
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur DC office receives bomb threat; Bomb squad conducts inspection
Vartha Bharati | 02-05-2025 | 16:58:00 IST
Raichur: A bomb threat email was received by the Raichur Deputy Commissioner's office on Thursday, claiming that an explosive device had been planted in the newly established DC office located in the outskirts at Eklaspur Layout. Following the alert, staff members rushed out of the building in panic.
